Export.Routine:
INTRNDeliveryList #include INConst #include COMSYS #def1arg TempStore(%1) ^CacheTemp(YUCI,YUSER,%1) CanPrintDelivery(pidTFR) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Determines whether Delivery List can be displayed ; ; Params: ; pidTFR - Key of header record ; ; ByRefs: None ; ; Returns: YQ implicitly ; ; History: ; 07-Aug-2008 PP SR15812: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new strStatus,objTFR do IsPrintingValid^INTRNValidation(pidTFR) set strStatus=$$IsPrintingValid^INTRNValidation(pidTFR) if ((+$$$WWWClientParamCoreChangesHEVA($get(^WWWClientParam(YM,YM,1)))) || (+$$$WWWClientParamCoreChangesSESPE($get(^WWWClientParam(YM,YM,1)))) || (+$$$WWWClientParamCoreChangesSESDF($get(^WWWClientParam(YM,YM,1))))) { if $$$ISOK(strStatus) { set objTFR = $get(^INTFR(YM,pidTFR,1)) if ($$$INTFRFREE6(objTFR) '= ""){ set strStatus = $$$NO } } } if $$$ISOK(strStatus) { set objTFR = $get(^INTFR(YM,pidTFR,1)) if $$$INTFRPickListPrinted(objTFR) = "" { set strStatus = $listbuild("IN00422") ; "Pick list needs to be printed." ; FIXME : This is not a valid strStatus string. } else { set strStatus = $$ProductError^INTRNValidation("IN00438") } ; "Please fix all errors before printing." } $$$YQHandler(strStatus) quit PrintDelivery(pidTFR) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Display Delivery List ; ; Params: ; pidTFR - Key of header record ; ; ByRefs: None ; ; Returns: Nothing ; ; History: ; 07-Aug-2008 PP SR15812: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- do CanPrintDelivery(pidTFR) if YQ = $$$YQEnable { do PrintDeliveryList(pidTFR) } else { do ReturnError^COMUtils($$$YQMessage) } quit PrintDeliveryList(pidTFR) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Display Delivery List. ; ; Params: ; pidTFR - Transfer Order Id ; ; ByRefs: None ; ; Returns: Nothing ; ; History: ; 07-Aug-2008 PP SR15812: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new strStatus set strStatus = $$Transaction^COMTransaction("PrintDeliveryListTxn^INTRNDeliveryList("""_pidTFR_""")",$$$YES) if $$$ISOK(strStatus) { //set $piece(^INUSER(YM,YBED,1),Y,76) = $$$INTFRTour($get(^INTFR(YM,pidTFR,1))) //do GoToTransferForm(61) ;BR014631 ;do GoToForm^COMUtilForm("INTRANSFER","","","",,,62) set strStatus = $$PrintDeliveryListDoc(pidTFR) } quit PrintDeliveryListTxn(pidTFR) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Update Delivery List printed time stamp. ; ; Params: ; pidTFR - Transfer Order Id ; ; ByRefs: None ; ; Returns: strStatus - $$$OK if successful, otherwise error message ; ; History: ; 07-Aug-2008 PP SR15812: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new objTFR,strStatus set strStatus = $$$OK set objTFR = $get(^INTFR(YM,pidTFR,1)) set $$$INTFRDeliveryListPrinted(objTFR) = $horolog set strStatus = $$$Save("INTFR",pidTFR,objTFR,$$$YES) quit strStatus PrintDeliveryListDoc(pidTFR) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Finally Print the Delivery List (HTML Print) ; ; Params: ; pidTFR - Transfer Order Id ; ; ByRefs: None ; ; Returns: strStatus - $$$OK if successful, otherwise error message ; ; History: ; 07-Aug-2008 PP SR15812: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new ShipLocn,strStatus set ShipLocn = $get(YLOCATION) kill ^WWWSOR(YUSER) set ANZM=0 do SORT(pidTFR) set YNOFOOT=1 do ^WWWBACK do DRUCK(pidTFR) if ANZM=0 do ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(46),1,,1) ; "No Data Available" kill ^WWWSOR(YUSER) quit $$$OK SORT(pidTFR) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; ; Params: ; ; Returns: ; ; NOTE: CHANGES HERE PROBABLY NEED TO BE MADE TO SORT in INTRANSFER [4,5,61,62,7,8,9] ; AND BeforeSave^INTRANSFER6 (& possibly other places) ; ; History: ; 06-Jan-2010 GRF SR17080: tag change ; 07-Sep-2006 RPW SR15002: If it's a Transfer (NEW) then get the receiving ; location and put the data in the correct order. ; 12-Nov-2005 PO SR13824: Skip deleted demands ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new ARTB,ARTN,DEMAND,DEMAND1,EINHEIT,idItem,idLine,idReceivingLocation,idStorage,idTFR new MENGE,MENGEL,objItem,objLine,objTFR set objTFR = $get(^INTFR(YM,pidTFR,1)) set idReceivingLocation = $$$INTFRReceivingLocation(objTFR) set idLine = "" for { set idLine = $order(^INTFRLine(YM,pidTFR,idLine)) quit:idLine="" set objLine = $get(^INTFRLine(YM,pidTFR,idLine,1)) set idItem = $$$INTFRLineItem(objLine) set objItem = $get(^INART(YM,idItem,1)) if $piece(objItem,Y,40)'="" { set EINHEIT = $$$AppEnum("EINHEIT",$piece(objItem,Y,40)) } set ARTB = "("_idItem_") "_$extract($piece(objItem,Y,1),0,20)_"..." set MENGEL = +$$$INTFRLineQuantity(objLine) ; set idStorage = $$GetStockLoc^INRECTFRLine(idItem,idReceivingLocation) ; SR17080 set idStorage = $$GetStorage^INRECTFRLine(idItem,idReceivingLocation) if idStorage = "" set idStorage = " " set DEMAND = $$$KEY2($$$INTFRLineDemand(objLine)) set DEMAND1 = "" //??? set ^WWWSOR(YUSER,pidTFR,idStorage,DEMAND)=ARTB_Y_+MENGEL_" "_EINHEIT_Y_DEMAND_Y_$piece(DEMAND1,Y,2) } quit DRUCK(pidTFR) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Prints delivery slip. ; ; Params: None ; ; ByRefs: None ; ; Returns: Nothing ; ; History: ; 22-Sep-2008 HQN SR15862: Corrected If/For refactor from 12-Sep-2008 ; 12-Sep-2008 GRF Dot Levels ; 07-Sep-2006 PO SR15002: If we have a transfer no, print in location order. ; 18-Jul-2006 PO SR14847: Show quantity to be picked in initially selected ; unit as well as base ; 20-Apr-2006 SC SR14320: Modified to use INVORGLANG, allows other languages. ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new RecLoc,RecLocB,ShipLocn,SOR1,strAlternate,TOUR1,TOURB,TOURTEXT,UES,VERSNR,VORG1 new ANZSEIT,DEMAND,idTFR,objTFR,objTour,objVORGLANG set VORG1 = $get(^INVORG(YM,YM,1)) set objVORGLANG = $get(^INVORGLANG(YM,YM,SPRACHE,1)) set TEXT=$$$INVORGLANGAfterTextInternalDelivery(objVORGLANG) ;ZUSATZTEXT set ANZSEIT = $piece(VORG1,Y,84) ;MAXIMAL ANZAHL PRO SEITE ;Number within side if ANZSEIT="" set ANZSEIT = 30 set objTFR = $get(^INTFR(YM,pidTFR,1)) set ShipLocn = $$$INTFRSendingLocation(objTFR) set UES="" set $piece(UES,Y,1)=$$^WWWTEXT(207) ;NR set $piece(UES,Y,2)=$$^WWWTEXT(32024) ;ARTIKEL ;item set $piece(UES,Y,3)=$$^WWWTEXT(31407) ;MENGE ;quantity set $piece(UES,Y,4)=$$^WWWTEXT(32612) ;DEMAND set $piece(UES,Y,5)=$$^WWWTEXT(32047) ;AUFTRAG ;order set $piece(UES,Y,6)=$$^WWWTEXT(31407) ;MENGE ;quantity do DrawTable(ShipLocn,pidTFR,pidTFR,ANZSEIT) ;ARTIKEL DRUCKEN ;item print if pidTFR = "" do . set VERSNR="" . for set VERSNR = $order(^WWWSOR(YUSER,VERSNR)) quit:VERSNR="" do . . set ANZM=0 . . set TOUR1=$get(^INDRPUMTOUR(YM,ShipLocn,VERSNR,1)) . . set TOURB="" . . set RecLocB="" . . set RecLoc=$piece(TOUR1,Y,3) . . set TOUR=$piece(TOUR1,Y,2) . . if TOUR="" set TOUR=" " . . if TOUR'="" set TOURB=$piece($get(^INDRPUMLKW(YM,TOUR,1)),Y,2) . . if RecLocB'="" set RecLocB="("_RecLoc_") "_$piece($get(^WWW0121(0,YM,RecLoc,1)),Y,1) . . ; . . if ANZM>0 do FF^WWWW() . . do UEBER(pidTFR) . . set YDDSATZ=0 . . set DEMAND="" . . for set DEMAND=$order(^WWWSOR(YUSER,VERSNR,DEMAND)) quit:DEMAND="" do . . . set SOR1=$get(^WWWSOR(YUSER,VERSNR,DEMAND)) . . . ; . . . if ANZM'=0 if ANZM#ANZSEIT=0 do ;NEUE SEITE ;side . . . . write "" . . . . write "" . . . .;DO ZUSATZTEXT . . . . do FF^WWWW() . . . . do UEBER(pidTFR) . . . ; . . . set ANZM=ANZM+1 . . . ; . . . do NL^WWWTAB . . . do NFZ^WWWTAB . . . write ANZM . . . write " " . . . write YCR . . . ; . . . do ZW^WWWTAB . . . write $piece(SOR1,Y,1) ;Type . . . write " " . . . write YCR . . . ; . . . do ZWR^WWWTAB . . . set strAlternate = $$BaseQuantity^INTRANSFER5(ShipLocn,$piece(SOR1,Y,3),$piece($piece(SOR1,Y,2)," ",2)) . . . if strAlternate '= "" write strAlternate . . . write $piece(SOR1,Y,2) ;quantity . . . write " " . . . write YCR . . . ; . . . do ZWZ^WWWTAB . . . write $piece(SOR1,Y,3) ;DEMAND . . . write " " . . . write YCR . . . ; . . . do ZWZ^WWWTAB . . . write $piece(SOR1,Y,4) ;order . . . write " " . . . write YCR . . . ; . . . do ZWZ^WWWTAB ;ANGENOMMEN ;adoptive . . . write " " . . . write YCR . . . ; . . . do EF^WWWTAB . . . do EL^WWWTAB . . ; . . do STOP^WWWTAB . . ;ZUSATZTEXT . . do ZUSATZTEXT(TEXT) quit DrawTable(pidSendingLocn,pidTour,pidTFR,pintLinesPerPage) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Construct Delivery List ; ; Params: ; pidSendingLocn - Sending Site Location ; pidTour - Tour Id ; pidTFR - Transfer Id ; pintLinesPerPage - Number of line to display per page ; ; ByRefs: None ; ; Returns: Nothing ; ; History: ; 17-Dec-2010 GRF -: replace $order macros ; 04-Sep-2006 PO SR15002: Rewite of line printing in DRUCK ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new idReceivingLocn,idDemand,strAlternate,objSOR do UEBER(pidTFR) set ANZM = 0 set YDDSATZ = 0 set idReceivingLocn = "" for { set idReceivingLocn = $order(^WWWSOR(YUSER,pidTour,idReceivingLocn)) quit:idReceivingLocn="" set idDemand = "" for { set idDemand = $order(^WWWSOR(YUSER,pidTour,idReceivingLocn,idDemand)) quit:idDemand="" set objSOR = $get(^WWWSOR(YUSER,pidTour,idReceivingLocn,idDemand)) if (ANZM '= 0) && (ANZM#pintLinesPerPage = 0) { write "" do FF^WWWW() do UEBER(pidTFR) } set ANZM = ANZM + 1 do NL^WWWTAB do NFZ^WWWTAB write ANZM_" " do ZW^WWWTAB write $piece(objSOR,Y,1)_" " do ZWR^WWWTAB set strAlternate = $$BaseQuantity^INTRANSFER5(pidSendingLocn,$piece(objSOR,Y,3),$piece($piece(objSOR,Y,2)," ",2)) if strAlternate '= "" write strAlternate write $piece(objSOR,Y,2)_" " do ZWZ^WWWTAB write $piece(objSOR,Y,3)_" " do ZWZ^WWWTAB write $piece(objSOR,Y,4)_" " do ZWZ^WWWTAB write " " do EF^WWWTAB do EL^WWWTAB } } do STOP^WWWTAB do ZUSATZTEXT() quit DEMANDEIN ;IN DRP DEMAND SPEICHE ;within DRP spoke /* NEW SATZ,KEY SET KEY=ShipLocn_","_DEMAND SET SATZ=DEMAND1 DO . SET $PIECE(SATZ,Y,62)=+$H ;LIEFERSCHEIN GEDRUCKT AM ;packing slip to the . SET $PIECE(SATZ,Y,63)=YBED ;LIEFERSCHEIN GEDRUCKT DURCH ;packing slip trans- . IF $PIECE(DEMAND1,Y,50)="" SET $PIECE(SATZ,Y,50)=$PIECE(SATZ,Y,5) ;GEPICKT MENGE ;quantity . IF $PIECE(DEMAND1,Y,60)="" SET $PIECE(SATZ,Y,60)=$PIECE(SATZ,Y,50) ;GELADET MENGE ;quantity . IF $PIECE(DEMAND1,Y,26)="" SET $PIECE(SATZ,Y,26)=$PIECE(SATZ,Y,60) ;GELIEFERT MENGE ;quantity . SET YOK=$$^WWWSPEI("INDRPDEMAND",KEY,SATZ,1) . DO ^INDRPSAVED(KEY,SATZ) ;UPDATE SUPPLY OF DESTINATION LOCATION;FIS;01.04.04 ;LOCATION */ quit ZUSATZTEXT(TEXT) ;ZUSATZTEXT new YI if ANZM'=0 if $get(TEXT)'="" do . write "
" . if '$find(TEXT,"<") do quit . for YI=1:1 quit:$piece(TEXT,"|",YI,9999)="" write $piece(TEXT,"|",YI),"
",YCR ;NUR TEXT ;only Text . for YI=1:1 quit:$piece(TEXT,"|",YI,9999)="" write $piece(TEXT,"|",YI),YCR ;HTML write YCR do FF^WWWW() write YCR,YCR quit UEBER(pidTFR) ; new I do KOPF(pidTFR) do START100^WWWTAB ;STARTEN DER ÜBERSCHRIFT ;launching the superscription write "" do NL^WWWTAB for I=1:1 quit:$piece(UES,Y,I,99)="" do NHWZ^WWWTAB write $piece(UES,Y,I)," " do EH^WWWTAB do EL^WWWTAB write "" quit KOPF(pidTFR) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Heading ; ; Params: ; ; ByRefs: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 17-Dec-2010 GRF -: close font block; TD should close with /TD not /TH ; 15-May-2006 PO SR14427: If transfer performed via Transfer Order form ; then display relevant details (Phase 2) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new dteTransfer,idFromLoc,idRef,idTFR,idToLoc,intStatus new objRecord,objTFR,strDescription set objTFR = $get(^INTFR(YM,pidTFR,1)) set idFromLoc = $$$INTFRSendingLocation(objTFR) set idToLoc = $$$INTFRReceivingLocation(objTFR) set idRef = $$$INTFRDispatch(objTFR) set intStatus = $$$INTFRStatus(objTFR) do START1000^WWWTAB write YCR,"" write "" write YCR,"",YCR write "",YCR write "
" write "" write YKOPF write "" write "
" write "" write $$^WWWTEXT(388)_": "_idFromLoc_" "_$piece($get(^WWW0121(0,YM,idFromLoc,1)),Y,1) ; "Location" write "" write "
",YCR do . write YCR,"" . write "",YCR . ; . write "",YCR . ; . write "",YCR write "
" . write "" . write "" . write $$^WWWTEXT(32807)_" "_$$^WWWTEXT(388)_": " ;BETRIEB . write idToLoc //$PIECE(TOUR1,Y,3) ;FÜR BETRIEB ;to location . if idToLoc'="" write " "_$piece($get(^WWW0121(0,YM,idToLoc,1)),Y,1) ;NAME . write "
" . write $$^WWWTEXT(32808)_": " ; "Route" . write idRef . if idRef'="" write " "_$piece($get(^INDRPUMLKW(YM,idRef,1)),Y,2) . write "" . write "		" . write "" . write "" . write " " . write "
" . write $piece($$^WWWTEXT(34327)," ",2,99) ; "Print Delivery Slip" . write "" . write "		" . write "" . write "" . ; . ; . if pidTFR '= "" do . . write $$^WWWFELDNAME("INTFR","P",1)_": "_pidTFR . . write "
"_$$$Text(32168)_": "_$$^WWWDATE($$$INTFRDueDate(objTFR)) ; "Delivery Date" . ; . write "" . write "
",YCR write "",YCR do STOP^WWWTAB quit
